https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gL6riNxQeyPXT5YsgqE2aWhl1zi.jpg Evan Lake, a veteran CIA agent, has been ordered to retire. But when his protégé uncovers evidence that Lake's nemesis, the terrorist Banir, has resurfaced, Lake goes rogue, embarking on a perilous, intercontinental mission to eliminate his sworn enemy. Dying of the Light
